scripts.dev: npm run build:mfes && npm run sync:mfes && npm run dev --prefix host
scripts.dev:mfes: concurrently -n sidebar,page1,page2 -c green,yellow,magenta "cross-env SINGLE_SPA=true npm run dev --prefix sidebar" "cross-env SINGLE_SPA=true npm run dev --prefix page1" "npm run dev --prefix page2"
scripts.build:mfes: npm run build --prefix sidebar && npm run build --prefix page1 && npm run build --prefix page2
scripts.start: concurrently -n host,sidebar,page1,page2 -c blue,green,yellow,magenta "npm run dev --prefix host" "npm run dev --prefix sidebar" "npm run dev --prefix page1" "npm run dev --prefix page2"
